name: Illyria
attacked: There's a Snake in my Ass
neutralHello: Pirates are heading to your current location right now.
tradeRequest: Normally I'd just pirate it but idk...
uniqueName: Time to incessantly commit piracy and then disappear off the face of the Earth.
uniques: No movement cost to pillage <for [Water] units>
uniqueText: Units are faster in coastal tiles, and coasts yield +1 [Gold]. Receive 1/3 of the cost of enemy water units, and Illyrian naval units pillage for free.
